38474.affected_area: Winnipeg  (Kildonan Drive, Rossmere, East Kildonan, East Kildonan - Transcona, Spring Field South, and Spring Field North)
live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank  you for your patience.

Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area. Further updates will continue in the morning.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38474.summary: Some customers in the Kildonan Drive, Rossmere, East Kildonan, East Kildonan - Transcona, Spring Field South, and Spring Field North areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38474.title: June 13 – Winnipeg | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
